metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11736 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
fr-archive-libarchive.c in GNOME file-roller through 3.36.1 allows Directory Traversal during extraction because it lacks a check of whether a file's parent is a symlink to a directory outside of the intended extraction location.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11736` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

file-roller - 3.28.0-1ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: file-roller package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.28.0-1ubuntu1.2').
